products.productDescription:
The PDF explains the difference between UX (user satisfaction) and UI (interface design), stressing user-centered, iterative design. It highlights the importance of usability heuristics, prototyping, and user feedback.

1.UX focuses on user needs, tasks, and satisfaction.
2.UI deals with layout, visuals, and interaction.
3.Iterative design and prototyping improve usability.
4.Nielsenâ€™s 10 heuristics guide effective interface design.
